Common symptoms are fever, dry, cough, tiredness
Serious symtpoms are aches and pains, sore throat, diarrhoea, conjunctivitis, headache, loss of taste or smell, a rash on skin, or discolouration of fingers or toes

patterns: how to be safe from covid
responses: Wear mask and sanitize hands every half hour, avoid public places, maintain distance, take vaccine

patterns: can you provide more information on covid?
responses: COVID-19 is the disease caused by a new coronavirus called SARS-CoV-2.  WHO first learned of this new virus on 31 December 2019, following a report of a cluster of cases of ‘viral pneumonia’ in Wuhan, People’s Republic of China.

patterns: what are the home remmedies for covid?
what to do at home to fight against covid?
responses: Do regular yoga pranayam at home
Drink warm water with turmeric
Maintain distance and isolate immediately as you see any symptoms
Keep checking oxygen level at regular intervals and check for rapid and non RTPCR tests if any signs
